11432.content:
Timothy is playing around in recess one school day, when he sees his beautiful pure of heart kitten girlfriend, Yoko, looking at something in a case beside her. Timothy goes over to her and says "Hi, Yoko." "Hi Timothy." Yoko said back "Did you see any of the anime's I suggested?" "Yes and then some!" Timothy exclaimed excitedly. "I LOVE ANIME NOW!!! Dragon Ball series, Pokémon, Digimon, Kimba, Unico, Totoro, Sailor Moon, Naruto, One Piece, Monster Rancher, Cardcaptor Sakura, xxxHolic, Tenchi Muyo, Yu-GI-Oh, Inuyasha, Kodocha, Rosario + Vampire, Ebichu, Chi's Sweet Home, Happy Happy Clover, Jewel Pet, Wolfs Rain, Wolf Children, Mon Colle Knights, Fighting Foodons, Tomako Market, Pet Shop of Horrors, Adventures of mini-Goddess, Bosco Adventure, Catnapped, Bannertail, Reborn, Cowboy Bebop, Fullmetal Alchemist, Excel Saga, Pandalian, Uninhabited Planet Survive, Honey Honey's Wonderful Adventures, Natsume Yuujinchou, Tamala 2010: A Punk Cat in Space, Slayers, Pom Poko, The Cat Returns, Silver Fang, Speed Racer, Bleach, Sherlock Hound, Neon Genesis Evangelion, Gurren Lagan, Battle Spirits, Shiawase Sou no Okojo-san, Lilpri, Tama and Friends, Massugu ni Ikou, Zatch Bell, Puella Magi Madoka Magica, Magic Angel Creamy Mami, D.N.Angel, Shirokuma Cafe, Cardliver, Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo, Dangan Ronpa, Dragon Half, Kill la Kill, Fables of the Green Forest, Hutch Honeybee, Eyeshield 21, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Full Moon o Sagashite Chironup no Kitsune, Blue Exorcist, Tokyo Mew Mew, Yo-Kai Watch, Nurse Witch Komugi, Dragon Drive, You Are Umasou, Panty and Stocking with Garterbelt, Space Dandy, Soul Eater, Pretty Cure series, Mysterious Joker, Cyber Team in Akihabara, Nausicaa Of The Valley Of The Wind, El-Hazard, Fairy Tail, Lucky Star, Azumanga Daioh, Shaman King, Sgt Frog, Hamtaro, Zorori, Negima! Magister Negi Magi, Hello Kitty, Maya the Bee, Hayate the Combat Butler, Samurai Pizza Cats, Kiki, Doraemon, Adventures of the Little Koala... The list of sexiness goes on and on" Yoko mentions "You seem impressed." Timothy responds "It's all thanks to you, Yoko. Sushi, Pocky, Anime. I am loving Japanese. Especially you. You are the best thing to come out of the country." Yoko blushed, and immediately sprinted over to Timothy and French kissed him, causing him to be turned on even more than he already is. Yoko's purring certainly helped as well.

After finishing the best French kiss ever, Yoko walks back to her case and mentions "Well, thanks to you, I am loving more and more of America. Shows like Ren & Stimpy, Rocko's Modern Life, Aaahh!!! Real Monsters, Angry Beavers, CatDog, Invader Zim, Cow and Chicken, Powerpuff Girls, Courage the Cowardly Dog, Grim Adventures of Billy and Mandy, Camp Lazlo, Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi, Chowder, Regular Show, Adventure Time, and The Amazing World of Gumball are very good. The best out of all of those, however, are My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic and Littlest Pet Shop. They are so awesome and beautiful." Timothy agrees "Of course they are." Yoko giggles. Timothy then asks after a very brief period of silence "So, what's in the case?" Yoko explains "Well, I've been wondering if I should try a new musical instrument, you know, besides the violin, and one day, it is like it just called for me. Soooooooooooo..... tempting." Yoko then reveals by pulling out of the case that she has a golden Subcontrabass Tuba. Timothy nearly peed his pants in awe, and started to pant and wag his raccoon tail like a dog because he knew that when she plays that tuba, it will be so erotic and sensual that he'll have the biggest turn on ever. Yoko mentions "I can see you are aroused by it." Timothy responds "Of course I am. Do you think you can serenade me with that kinky tuba?"

"Of course I will," replied Yoko, "It's my job as a 2-year-old, Brony, American loving, hot and sexy Japanese kitten to fulfill dirty fantasies, especially the ones of 5-year-old, Brony, Japanese loving, hot and sexy American raccoons like yourself. Of course you are unique exotic and erotic." explains the happy Yoko. Somehow, she managed to say that in a way that was equally innocent and pure, and flirtatious and seductive. Even the winking of her right eye was equally innocent and pure, and flirtatious and seductive. She then licks her lips innocently and purely, and flirtatiously and seductively, takes a innocent and pure and flirtatious and seductive deep breath, and blew into the mouth piece, making the loudest sound ever, causing her cheeks to puff up huge, her tail's fur puffs up, the fur on the rest of her body stands straight up, and she levitates sideways in the air as she plays. The other kids at recess, Nora, Charles, Lilly, Frank & Frank, Doris, Fritz, Claude, and Grace, immediately hear the sensual sounds of Yoko's tuba so they turn to look, but they are immediately blown away by the soundwaves like they are in a hurricane, flying into the sky. A twinkle is seen as they go completely out of sight. The sound waves are even strong enough to blow the entire Hilltop School at least five miles from its original place. Timothy, despite beingth closest, manages to keep his feet firmly on the ground, letting his fur flow with the air of the tuba sounds and crying tears of joy as she plays, whispering "Its so beautiful." Yoko's face turns red, then orange, then yellow, then green, then indigo, then blue, then cyan, then pink, then lavender, then violet, then purple, and finally back to her original color, as she continues blowing. She also is sweating profusely and also crying tears of joy. When she finishes, her feet are back on the ground, her fur is not puffed and straight anymore, and she doesn't even need to take a breath. She smiles, and gracely, innocently, sweetly, purely, flirtatiously, and seductively curtseys for Timothy. Timothy applauds and bounces around with excitement exclaiming "OH MY GOSH, THAT WAS SO MAJESTIC AND BEAUTIFUL AND COOL AND AWESOME AND EXOTIC AND EROTIC!!!" Timothy suddenly stops, because he thinks he said something he shouldn't have. Yoko, however, just giggles and says "Don't worry. I would have bawled if you were not turned on by my tuba playing skills." She also innocently and purely, and flirtatiously and seductively winks at Timothy. This makes Timothy even more happy, as well as more satisfied and dignified. "Thank you" Timothy says in reply. "You're welcome. Also, I have a surprise for you!" Yoko says in a cheery and eager tone. She goes back to her case, and pulls out another golden Subcontrabass Tuba, and then throws it to Timothy. He catches it, but it weighed a ton, though he still manages to hold on to it. "I had enough money to buy two, and I figured you would be interested, so I decided to give it to you." Timothy looks at the instrument, and then looked back at Yoko. He began to cry tears of joy, saying to Yoko "Thank you." He then immediate licks his lips innocently and purely, and flirtatiously and seductively. Yoko starts feel excited about this, and starts to pant and wang her tail like a dog at this, ironic since she is a cat. Timothy takes a deep innocent and pure, and flirtatious and seductive breath, and then blows into the mouthpiece of the tuba.
11432.title: Stick with Tuba

114322.content:
Timothy closes his eyes while attempting to blow into the tuba, causing his cheeks to puff up huge, his tail's fur to puff up, the fur on the rest of his body to stand straight up, and to levitate sideways in the air as he plays. However, no sound comes out. What happens instead is that his body starts to grow. First, his cheeks start to inflate. Then his belly and chest start inflating, and then his tail starts inflating like a round ball, then his ears start inflating, then his fingers and toes start inflating, then his hands, arms, feet, and legs start inflating, and finally, his head starts inflating. The body stretched out to a big mass, and he did not know how it was happening. He is stretched to fifty feet tall and fifty feet wide. Yoko looks upon this in awe.

She finds this both extremely erotic and extremely hilarious, so she begins blushing and laughing profusely.
